text: Mom was the greatest influence of my childhood. She wanted to save me from the vice, lust, and drinking that was all about me.
author: Ethel Waters

text: Mom never quit on me. My only regret is that she didn't live long enough to share some of the money and comforts my work in show business has brought me.
author: Ethel Waters

text: In her whole life Mom never earned more than five or six dollars a week. Being without a husband, it was hard for her to find any place at all for us to live.
author: Ethel Waters

text: That's the hardest thing about being a mom. You want to be cool, and you want them to like you all the time, but you can't always have that. You're gonna have times where you have to say no, and you won't be the most popular person in the house.
author: Martina McBride

text: My mom used to have a lot of European cinema playing in the house, so I'd catch bits and pieces of films.
author: Mia Wasikowska
